description:
While Captain Smoker determines his next move, a very large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard`s mysterious transformation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le pire scientifique du monde. L’abominable César !
Sekai Saiaku Kyoufu no Kagakusha Caesar
The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!
¡Lo peor del mundo! El terrible científico, Caesar
Худший в мире! Безумный ученый - Цезарь!
الأسوأ في العالم! العالِم المرعب سيزار!
世界最悪 恐怖の科学者シーザー
